languages.text: "Нет, {name}. То, что вы предлагаете — это не правосудие Императора. Вы искажаете Лекс Империалис и ставите превыше всего не Его волю, а собственное мировоззрение. Я не смогу принять такой исход".
"No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."
languages.original_text: "Нет, {name}. То, что вы предлагаете — это не правосудие Императора. Вы искажаете Лекс Империалис и ставите превыше всего не Его волю, а собственное мировоззрение. Я не смогу принять такой исход".

traits.locale_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."
"No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."
"No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."
"No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."
"No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

languages.text: "Nein, {name}. Was Ihr vorschlagt, ist nicht die Gerechtigkeit des Gottimperators. Ihr untergrabt das Lex Imperia und stellt Euer eigenes Ego über alles ... selbst gegen Seinen Willen. Das kann ich nicht zulassen."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, {name}. Was Ihr vorschlagt, ist nicht die Gerechtigkeit des Gottimperators. Ihr untergrabt das Lex Imperia und stellt Euer eigenes Ego über alles ... selbst gegen Seinen Willen. Das kann ich nicht zulassen."

languages.text: « Non, {name}. Ce que vous proposez va à l'encontre de la justice de l'Empereur-Dieu. Vous détournez la Lex Imperialis au profit de votre ego, que vous placez au-dessus même de Sa volonté. Je ne peux pas l'accepter. »
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {name}. Ce que vous proposez va à l'encontre de la justice de l'Empereur-Dieu. Vous détournez la Lex Imperialis au profit de votre ego, que vous placez au-dessus même de Sa volonté. Je ne peux pas l'accepter. »

languages.text: “这可不行，{name}，你所说的并不是神皇的正义。你这是在扭曲帝国的律法，将你的权力置于一切之上，甚至高于神皇的意志。我无法接受这样的结果。”
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: “这可不行，{name}，你所说的并不是神皇的正义。你这是在扭曲帝国的律法，将你的权力置于一切之上，甚至高于神皇的意志。我无法接受这样的结果。”

languages.text: «No, {name}. Lo que propone no es la justicia del Dios Emperador. Está pervirtiendo la Lex Imperialis y anteponiendo su ego a todo lo demás, incluso Su voluntad. No puedo aceptar este resultado».
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: «No, {name}. Lo que propone no es la justicia del Dios Emperador. Está pervirtiendo la Lex Imperialis y anteponiendo su ego a todo lo demás, incluso Su voluntad. No puedo aceptar este resultado».

languages.text: 「いいえ、{name}。あなたが提案しているのは神帝陛下の正義ではありません。あなたはレックス・インペリアを歪め、あのお方の意志さえも顧みず、自分のエゴを何よりも優先させています。私はこの結果を受け入れられません」
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、{name}。あなたが提案しているのは神帝陛下の正義ではありません。あなたはレックス・インペリアを歪め、あのお方の意志さえも顧みず、自分のエゴを何よりも優先させています。私はこの結果を受け入れられません」

languages.text: "Olmaz {name}. Önerdiğiniz, Tanrı İmparator'un adaleti değildir. Lex İmperialis'i saptırıp kendi egonuzu her şeyin, O'nun iradesinin bile önüne koyuyorsunuz. Bu kararı kabul edemem."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. What you are proposing is not the God-Emperor's justice. You are distorting the Lex Imperialis and placing your own ego above all else, even His will. I cannot accept this outcome."

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz {name}. Önerdiğiniz, Tanrı İmparator'un adaleti değildir. Lex İmperialis'i saptırıp kendi egonuzu her şeyin, O'nun iradesinin bile önüne koyuyorsunuz. Bu kararı kabul edemem."
